rows.label: qst701104_msg0001
rows.name:
Ah, everyone! Thank you so
much for your help back then.

rows.label: qst701104_msg0002
rows.name:
...Reinforced glass? Of course, I
handle that. Please wait a moment.

rows.label: qst701104_msg0003
rows.name:
Please take this. Ah...
there's no charge.

rows.label: qst701104_msg0004
rows.name:
It's thanks to all of you that I can continue
to make glass like this... so please let me
do this much as a small token of my thanks.

rows.label: qst701104_msg0005
rows.name:
If you'd like, please come
visit again anytime. Even if
it's not about... glass.
